page.title: 18A Day In The Life Of Melissa
page.content: A typical day for me starts at 7 am. when my dad comes and wakes me. I go downstairs, have a wash, get dressed, eat my breakfast, get my school things ready and leave for school at half past eight. I walk up the hill on my own. When I see a friend I like I walk with her. At school we do reading first. Outside our classroom are some books. I'm in charge of them with Tricia. At playtime I play 'He' around the school bus but I like 'Anchor' too. At dinner time I mostly have sausage and chips. After school my sister comes over to my house with her baby boy and she asks me if I want to hold him. I say yes. Most of the time he sleeps. On Mondays at 7 o'clock my dad goes out to play a pool match and tries to win a trophy. He has won some already but he is trying to win another. At 9 o'clock I go to bed.
